item.description:
At our last meeting on October 25th the October 11 Mobilizing Committee agreed to continue our discussion around the next steps forward in organizing opposition to the wars, the strategies being put forward, as well as the various campaigns that are being organized.

I would encourage all to attend so that we can discuss plans and continue the collaboration that made October 11 a success. Please send out other ideas that you would like to see discussed at the meeting.

Meeting: October 11 Organizing Committee
Saturday, December 6, 3:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor
Boston, MA
(Chinatown Stop on the Orange Line T)
item.name: October 11 Follow-up Evaluation Meeting
